summary: This code initiates the setup for viral video data analysis and prediction. It clones two repositories, ViralCaster for analysis and prediction tasks, and 360ImageSearch and BaiduSerchImgApi for image recognition purposes.

details.comment: This code initiates the setup for viral video data analysis and prediction. It clones two repositories, ViralCaster for analysis and prediction tasks, and 360ImageSearch and BaiduSerchImgApi for image recognition purposes.
details.content:
# viral video data analysis, prediction
# git clone https://github.com/jjbreen/ViralCaster
# image recognition
git clone https://github.com/chenguanyou/BaiduSerchImgApi
git clone https://github.com/chenguanyou/360ImageSearch
